#Text=Severobaikalsk
#Text=Severobaikalsk ( Russian : Северобайка́льск see-veer-uh-bigh-KAL'SK ) is small town in located on the shores of Lake Baikal Buryatia , Russia .
#Text=Understand
#Text=The town was founded in 1974 and has a population of around 26,000 .
#Text=It is a big railway hub of Baikal-Amur Mainline and has no big industries .
#Text=The streets have 5-floor apartment houses with unusual outlines as if they were made of cells .
#Text=You wo n't see buildings with balconies for the seismic safety precautions .
#Text=The center of the city is Leningradsky Prospekt that goes from the railway station to the Central square .
#Text=By train
#Text=The city is a major stop on the Baikal-Amur Mainline .
#Text=It is a 4.5 day journey from Moscow , with the train making stops in large cities such as Novosibirsk , Krasnoyarsk and Bratsk .
#Text=By plane
#Text=The nearest airport is in Nizhneangarsk 25km away from the city .
#Text=You can fly to Irkutsk ( 1 hour 15 min ) and Ulan Ude ( 1 hour 20 min ) .
#Text=By boat
#Text=During the summer , there is a hydrofoil service from Irkutsk — an 11-hour journey .
#Text=Three times a week .
#Text=See
#Text=Museum of the BAM builders at 2 , Mira st.
#Text=Art gallery at 40 , Druzhby st.
#Text=Get a local bus south to the picturesque fishing village of Baikalskoe , & hike up the headland , for breathtaking views of Lake Baikal .
#Text=It 's possible to follow the track around the clifftops , & loop around via a camping ground in a bay , back into Baikalskoe .
#Text=Do
#Text=Hire a cutter and go to the hot springs for soaking .
#Text=Buy
#Text=You can visit an exhibition in Dom Kultury and choose a souvenir .
#Text=There are also paintings and photographs of local artists .
#Text=Eat
#Text=Try traditional dishes at бузии house .
#Text=Sleep
#Text=Dom u Baikala ( Дом у Байкала ) , 3 Neptunsky proezd , ☏ +7 301-30 2-39-50 , ✉ baikal-kruiz@yandex.ru .
#Text=One and two-floor wooden houses with single an double rooms with toilet , douche and TV inside .
#Text=Price for a single stay is 750-800 руб , double is 1500 руб .
#Text=You can also play billiard or order week excursions , which include yachting , rafting , visiting a waterfall and a sandy beach .
#Text=Hotel Olymp ( Отель Олимп ) , 2Б Poligrafistov st. , ☏ +730130 2-39-80 , ✉ defail@yandex.ru .
#Text=Business and standard room includes TV , minibar , a safe , refrigerator and wi-fi , toilet and a douche for one rooom or two .
#Text=Hotel Golden Fish ( Золотая рыбка ) , ☏ +730130 2-22-31 , +7 30130 2-11-34 , ✉ golden_fish89@mail.ru .
#Text=The hotel includes three cottages , one in the city , two in the forest , with double rooms for 2500 руб , 1900 руб , 1200 руб accordingly .
#Text=Additional services : Russian sauna , massage , breakfast , transfer to airport , tours to hot springs and fishing .
#Text=Go next
#Text=By train to Novosibirsk ( 40 hours ) , Krasnoyarsk ( 30 hours ) , Bratsk ( 14 hours ) , Irkutsk ( 31 hours ) and Ulan-Ude ( 38 hours ) .
#Text=By plane to Ulan-Ude from airport in Nizhneangarsk .
